context.original_query: Query 1: What's the latest news about F35?

memory.original_query: Query 1: What's the latest news about F35?
memory.summarizer_summary:
Here's a concise overview of the latest news regarding the F-35 fighter jet based on the provided URLs:

*   **Upgrades:** The F-35 is set to receive critical upgrades in 2025 production lots ([https://www.navalnews.com/naval-news/2025/03/f-35-set-to-receive-critical-upgrades-in-2025-production-lots/](https://www.navalnews.com/naval-news/2025/03/f-35-set-to-receive-critical-upgrades-in-2025-production-lots/)).
*   **Air Force Approach:** Changes are needed in the Air Force's approach to F-35 development ([https://www.nationaldefensemagazine.org/articles/2024/9/17/air-force-approach-to-f-35-development-must-change](https://www.nationaldefensemagazine.org/articles/2024/9/17/air-force-approach-to-f-35-development-must-change)).
*   **Delivery Pause Lifted:** The US has accepted 36 upgraded F-35s since the delivery pause was lifted ([https://www.defensenews.com/air/2024/09/18/us-has-accepted-36-upgraded-f-35s-since-lifting-delivery-pause/](https://www.defensenews.com/air/2024/09/18/us-has-accepted-36-upgraded-f-35s-since-lifting-delivery-pause/)).
*   **Future of F-35:** An analysis of the F-35's future as the world's most advanced stealth fighter ([https://breakingdefense.com/2025/05/the-f-35s-future-the-worlds-most-advanced-stealth-fighter-and-what-comes-next-video/](https://breakingdefense.com/2025/05/the-f-35s-future-the-worlds-most-advanced-stealth-fighter-and-what-comes-next-video/)).
*   **Potential F-55 Fighter:** Discussion of a possible twin-engined F-35 variant, potentially called the F-55 ([https://www.airandspaceforces.com/trump-touts-f-55-fighter-is-there-a-twin-engined-f-35-in-the-air-forces-future/](https://www.airandspaceforces.com/trump-touts-f-55-fighter-is-there-a-twin-engined-f-35-in-the-air-forces-future/)).

nodes.description: Search for latest news articles about F35 using DuckDuckGo.
Summarize the content of the news articles.

code_variants.CODE_0A:
urls = duckduckgo_search('latest news F35 fighter jet', 3)
return { "urls": urls }
code_variants.CODE_0B:
urls = duckduckgo_search('F35 news today', 3)
return { "urls": urls }
code_variants.CODE_0C:
urls = duckduckgo_search('recent F35 developments', 3)
return { "urls": urls }

summarizer_snapshots.summary_output:
Here's a concise overview of the latest news regarding the F-35 fighter jet based on the provided URLs:

*   **Upgrades:** The F-35 is set to receive critical upgrades in 2025 production lots ([https://www.navalnews.com/naval-news/2025/03/f-35-set-to-receive-critical-upgrades-in-2025-production-lots/](https://www.navalnews.com/naval-news/2025/03/f-35-set-to-receive-critical-upgrades-in-2025-production-lots/)).
*   **Air Force Approach:** Changes are needed in the Air Force's approach to F-35 development ([https://www.nationaldefensemagazine.org/articles/2024/9/17/air-force-approach-to-f-35-development-must-change](https://www.nationaldefensemagazine.org/articles/2024/9/17/air-force-approach-to-f-35-development-must-change)).
*   **Delivery Pause Lifted:** The US has accepted 36 upgraded F-35s since the delivery pause was lifted ([https://www.defensenews.com/air/2024/09/18/us-has-accepted-36-upgraded-f-35s-since-lifting-delivery-pause/](https://www.defensenews.com/air/2024/09/18/us-has-accepted-36-upgraded-f-35s-since-lifting-delivery-pause/)).
*   **Future of F-35:** An analysis of the F-35's future as the world's most advanced stealth fighter ([https://breakingdefense.com/2025/05/the-f-35s-future-the-worlds-most-advanced-stealth-fighter-and-what-comes-next-video/](https://breakingdefense.com/2025/05/the-f-35s-future-the-worlds-most-advanced-stealth-fighter-and-what-comes-next-video/)).
*   **Potential F-55 Fighter:** Discussion of a possible twin-engined F-35 variant, potentially called the F-55 ([https://www.airandspaceforces.com/trump-touts-f-55-fighter-is-there-a-twin-engined-f-35-in-the-air-forces-future/](https://www.airandspaceforces.com/trump-touts-f-55-fighter-is-there-a-twin-engined-f-35-in-the-air-forces-future/)).
